title: Giordan
description: Welcome to Mythos! As a founder of Mythos Media, my goal was to bring world-class marketing and advanced business services to firms in select industries that needed these services most. In an increasingly globalized and competitive landscape, I saw small to medium sized firms struggle to keep up with the complex developments happening in the commercial world. We created Mythos to help meet the needs of these firms in the most efficient way possible, connecting businesses to local and global markets by tapping into an international network of professional expertise.

title: Ranj
description: As one of the founders of Mythos Media, I made it my mission to connect the vision behind Mythos and our services to clients at home and abroad. With over a decade of sales experience, I take full responsibility for client satisfaction. By ensuring that the client is at the center of everything we do, I make sure that Mythos has fruitful relationships with our clients that extend well beyond a mere transaction.

title: Rokaya
description: Hey! I am Rokaya Timija. As Editor and Lead Copywriter, I blend creativity with strategic thinking to craft compelling narratives. My background in International Studies and Diplomacy helps me communicate complex ideas with clarity and impact. I see every piece of content as a chance to influence and inspire. When I'm not writing, I attend think tanks and conferences to stay updated on global debates and innovations, which keeps my work fresh and insightful.

title: Kartik
description: As the tech lead at Mythos, I focus on building high-performance web solutions that are both user-centric and technically robust. I lead our engineering efforts with a hands-on approach—mentoring developers, setting clear technical direction, and ensuring smooth execution from planning to deployment. I believe that strong collaboration and continuous learning are key to delivering impactful technology. Off the clock, you’ll often find me on the cricket field or diving into the latest advancements in AI and emerging tech—pursuits that keep me sharp, curious, and constantly evolving as both a developer and a leader.

title: Sara
description: Hey there! I’m Sara Zekri, design director at Mythos Media, with 9 years of experience in graphic design, and visual communication. My role focuses on crafting cohesive visual identities, guiding web design, and creating impactful assets from social media posts to prints. I began my journey with a degree in Applied Art and a professional diploma in graphic design. At Mythos, I’m excited to push creative boundaries and help our clients shine. When I’m not working, you’ll find me playing guitar, spending time with loved ones, or enjoying anime—currently hooked on One Piece!.

title: Michelle
description: I’ve dedicated the past few years to the real estate industry, combining my sales expertise with a knack for recruitment. I love connecting the right people with the right opportunities, ensuring that everyone involved comes out ahead.

title: Eric
description: I've spent several years working with one of Canada’s top B2B sales organizations. I'm not just driven by results—I’m passionate about building meaningful client relationships and finding solutions that truly make a difference.
